summary: This version updates the Catch Rate Estimator & Minlucks to support special catch rate modifiers and updates Native Dark Mode styling coverage.

details.title: Catch Rate Estimator & Minlucks
items: Added support for special catch rate modifiers, such as Dragonbane Charms, different locations, and more

details.title: Location Dashboards
items: Updated text of Fiery Warpath and Fort Rox to support portals

details.title: Native Dark Mode
items: Added styling for many pages and elements

details.title: Other
items: Optimized performance and memory usage of requests
Removed 'Better Inventory: Add list of all items to top of inventory pages' experiment
